400_BAD_REQUEST.TITLE: 400 Bad Request
400_BAD_REQUEST.DESCRIPTION: You entered wrong URL or probably this is not correct way to access.

403_FORBIDDEN.TITLE: 403 Forbidden
403_FORBIDDEN.DESCRIPTION: Sorry. You can not proceed without permission.

404_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: 404 Not Found
404_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: Sorry. The contents you looking for doesn't exist.

500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.TITLE: Sorry, Something went wrong.
500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: We will fix this problem soon.

ERROR.UNKNOWN: Sorry, Something went wrong. Please try again.
